argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psubcli2.p | |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) |
| 2 |  | psubcli2.c | |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Atoms ` K ) = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 4 | 3, 1, 2 | #P_ispsubclN | |- ( K e. D -> ( X e. C <-> ( X C_ ( Atoms ` K ) /\ ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = X ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simplbda | |- ( ( K e. D /\ X e. C ) -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = X ) |
